import React from 'react' const Books = (props) => { if (!props.show) { return null } let genres = props.genres.allBooks const books = props.books.allBooks const merged = [] genres.map(g => merged.push(g.genres)) genres = merged.flat(1).filter(g => !merged.includes(g)) console.log(genres) return (

books

{books.map(a => )} {}
author published
{a.title} {a.author.name} {a.published}
) } export default Books
